## `SetGraphWatermark`

Sets the watermark to be written across graphs.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetGraphWatermark(string label)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` label | The text to draw across the graphs. |
:::
